duties_responsibilities.duty: Architect, integrate, and support critical applications for Holland & Hart.
Explain application specifications to technical and business stakeholders.
Evaluate the need for application solutions, propose solutions, and present to department managers.
Assimilate information from disparate sources, analyze, and implement solutions across multiple departments.
Establish, implement, and document technology integration and migration strategies.
Work with consultants and internal teams on strategic decisions, integrations, and upgrades.
Escalate and resolve critical applications issues with vendors.
Provide mentorship to other team members and prioritize work/projects in a high-pressure environment.
Participate in technical designs and assume the role of IT project leader for small to medium size initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s in Information Technology or relevant field; Or high school diploma with four years IT experience with hardware and business applications.
12+ years of IT experience focused on software application analysis or support.
8+ years working at an AmLaw 200 firm or other professional services partnership is preferred.
Hands-on experience applying applications architecture and design tools.
Proficiency with MS SQL Server and the t-SQL language.
Aderant, iManage, InTapp, or Relativity experience is a plus.
